com.peterson.markovchain

Class ConcurrentBasicMarkovChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peterson.markovchain.BasicMarkovChain
      • com.peterson.markovchain.ConcurrentBasicMarkovChain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MarkovChain

    public class ConcurrentBasicMarkovChain
extends BasicMarkovChain
    Extension of the BasicMarkovChain to provide synchronized access to the generator. This overrides the basic structure of the generator to use a synchronized map and lists.
    Author:
    Peterson, Ryan Created: 6/8/15

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConcurrentBasicMarkovChain

        public ConcurrentBasicMarkovChain()
        Constructs a synchronized version of the generator. This provides all the basic functionality to generate markov chains, as described in the parent class.
